basics.name: Sunguk Jang (장성욱)
basics.label: Medical AI Researcher
basics.summary: AI Researcher specializing in Debiasing, Robustness, and Healthcare AI. Focused on Long-tailed Learning, Spurious Correlations on EHR, and Domain Adaptation for medical applications.

work.name: AITRICS
work.summary: Specialized Research Personnel (Military Service Alternative: Mar 2023 - Mar 2026)
highlights: Developed Target Domain-optimized Source Data Selection Algorithm for Disease Early Prediction Models
Improved Bidirectional LSTM model performance across multiple hospitals with enhanced AUROC, AUPRC, F1-score, and PPV metrics
Led Domain Adaptation research for EHR data, focusing on spurious correlation mitigation
Contributed to flagship product using Vital Signs and Lab test data for disease prediction

work.name: MLV Lab, Korea University
work.summary: Conducted research on machine learning and computer vision

volunteer.summary: Peer review for Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition conference

education.institution: Korea Advanced Institute of Science and Technology (KAIST)
education.area: AI (Kim Jaechul Graduate School of AI)
education.thesis: Decoupled Training for Long-Tailed Classification With Stochastic Representations

education.area: Computer Science and Engineering (Double Major: Statistics)
highlights: National Scholarship for Science and Engineering (2 years)

awards.title: National Scholarship for Science and Engineering
awards.summary: Full scholarship for 2 years during undergraduate studies

awards.title: SW Maestro 11th Generation
awards.summary: Selected as SW Maestro training program participant

publications.name: Decoupled Training for Long-Tailed Classification With Stochastic Representations
publications.summary: Co-first author, led research design and implementation

publications.name: SC-LnD: Super-Class Learning & Pseudo-Label Debiasing Framework for Improved Long-Tailed Semi-Supervised Learning
